caption.title: Definition of the measures of regeneration

tr.th: Regeneration factors were measured as below when a neuron was categorized as regeneration

tr.td: The length of axon that was lost between the location of axotomy and the initial retraction bulb
The time it took to form the initial retraction bulb, measured from the time point of axotomy
The number of neurons that regenerated, over the total neurons which formed a retraction bulb
The time between the retraction bulb formation and the start of a steady extension lasting more than 1 hr and leading to regeneration
The length of axon that extended within 2 hr after regeneration initiation time
The average of the extending tip area measured at 20, 40, and 60 min after regeneration initiation
